articles.author: Cara Lombardo, Miriam Gottfried
articles.title: NCR Is Nearing a Deal to Buy ATM Operator Cardtronics - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Deal would value Cardtronics at $39 a share, or about $1.7 billion
articles.content:
NCR Corp. is nearing a deal to buy Cardtronics PLC after outbidding a pair of investment firms that had earlier agreed to buy the ATM operator.
